main event: A UFO sighting involving many blueish-green triangular objects reported in Cleveland, Ohio on August 18, 1961.
interesting points: The objects changed color and became much brighter than the brightest star,The sighting lasted many moments and occurred between 1600 to 1830 hours,Two F-86 or F-102 aircraft were reported flying in the area to investigate the sighting,The objects were visible within 5Â° of the sun's rays,The conclusion categorized the observed objects as balloons due to false echo during sonar testing.
witness description: The observer called from the Cleveland Plain Dealer to report the sighting.
